description: Get Services Done For the Price you desire. Offer Services and earn money.

scripts.clientSetup: cd client && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.serverSetup: cd server && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.devSetup: yarn install && npm run clientSetup && npm run serverSetup
scripts.devStart: yarn install && concurrently --kill-others -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --names "clientSetup,serverSetup" -p "{index}" --success "all" --restart-tries 5 --restart-after 1000   "npm run startClient" "npm run startServer"
scripts.oldDevStart: cd client && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ../server && yarn install
scripts.dev-from-scratch: npm install && cd server && yarn install && cd.. && cd client && yarn install && cd.. && concurrently "npm run start-server-prod" "npm run start-client-prod"
